wikipedia_page.main: Carl King (born Carl Preston King, 1 October 1949, Beckenham, Kent, England), also known as Karl King, is a British singer and songwriter, who released two singles on CBS in 1966 and 1967.  He started singing at the age of seven and became a member of the Southwark Cathedral choir at eleven

response: Carl King is a fictional character in Emmerdale.
Carl King may also refer to:
* American musician whose real name is Carl King, Sir Millard Mulch
